scenario = 'S3', payment_mode = 'RTGS', slab = '5001-10000', amount = 6000, excel_client_code = 'DJ050', excel_environment = 'STAGING', ensure_db_updated = None

    @allure.story("Cancel Transaction Button Check")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.CRITICAL)
    @pytest.mark.ui
    @pytest.mark.regression
    def test_calculation_amount(self, page_with_screenshot, scenario, payment_mode, slab, amount, excel_client_code,
                                excel_environment, ensure_db_updated):
        """Test the cancel transaction button functionality."""
        timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
        allure.dynamic.title(
            f"Calculation Testing | Scenario={scenario} | Mode={payment_mode} | Slab={slab} | Amount={amount}"
        )
        self.logger.info(f"--- Starting calculation Test for {scenario} | {payment_mode} | {slab} | {amount} ---")
    
        bill_amount = conv_charges = total_amount = txn_id = "N/A"
        status = "Fail"
    
        try:
            if payment_mode == "UPI INTENT":
                viewport_size = {"width": 375, "height": 667}  # Example: iPhone-like dimensions
                page_with_screenshot.set_viewport_size(viewport_size)
                self.logger.info(
                    f"Set viewport size to {viewport_size['width']}x{viewport_size['height']} for UPI INTENT mode")
                allure.attach(page_with_screenshot.screenshot(), name="UPI Intent Initial Viewport",
                              attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG)
    
    
            # Initialize page objects
            client = ClientPage(page_with_screenshot)
            client_details = ClientDetailsPage(page_with_screenshot)
            pg = PaymentGatewayPage(page_with_screenshot)
            pg_response = PaymentGatewayResponsePage(page_with_screenshot)
    
            # Fill and verify client and payer details
            fill_and_verify_client_details(self.logger, client, client_details, excel_client_code, excel_environment)
            fill_payer_details(
                self.logger, client_details, ReadConfig.get_payer_first_name(),
                ReadConfig.get_payer_last_name(), str(amount), ReadConfig.get_payer_phone(),
                ReadConfig.get_payer_email()
            )
    
            # Get transaction ID
            with allure.step(f"Accessing the Client_txn_id"):
                txn_id = client_details.get_value("_client_transaction_id")
                allure.attach(txn_id, name=f"Client Transaction ID for {excel_client_code}",
                              attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)
    
            # Click Pay button
            with allure.step("Clicking Pay Button"):
                self.logger.info("Clicking Pay button")
                client_details.click("_pay_btn")
    
            time.sleep(5)
    
            # Handle payment mode and get amounts
>           bill_amount, conv_charges, total_amount = self._handle_payment_mode(pg, payment_mode, self.logger)

self = <testCases.Calculation_test.TestCalculations object at 0x00000126DC078870>, pg = <pageObjects.payment_gateway_page.PaymentGatewayPage object at 0x00000126DC1C3100>
payment_mode = 'RTGS', logger = <RootLogger root (DEBUG)>

    def _handle_payment_mode(self, pg, payment_mode, logger):
        """Handle payment mode-specific logic."""
    
        bill_amount = conv_charges = total_amount = "N/A"
        pm_data = self.PAYMENT_MODE_MAPPING.get(payment_mode)
        if not pm_data:
            raise ValueError(f"Unsupported Payment Mode: {payment_mode}")
    
        pg.select_payment_mode("_payment_mode", pm_data["type"])
    
    
        if pm_data["type"] == PaymentMode.CARD:
            pg.fill("_pg_card_number", os.getenv(f"{pm_data['env_prefix']}_CARD_NUMBER"))
            time.sleep(2)
            pg.fill("_pg_card_holder_name", os.getenv(f"{pm_data['env_prefix']}_CARD_NAME"))
            pg.fill("_pg_card_exp_date", os.getenv(f"{pm_data['env_prefix']}_CARD_EXPIRY"))
            pg.fill("_pg_card_cvv", os.getenv(f"{pm_data['env_prefix']}_CARD_CVV"))
            bill_amount, conv_charges, total_amount = self._get_amounts(pg, logger)
            pg.click("_procced_button")
    
        elif pm_data["type"] == PaymentMode.UPI:
            pg.fill("_pg_upi_id", os.getenv(f"{pm_data['env_prefix']}_VPA"))
            try:
                pg.click("_pg_upi_verify")
            except Exception as e:
                logger.error(f"Failed to verify UPI ID: {str(e)}")
            time.sleep(2)
            bill_amount, conv_charges, total_amount = self._get_amounts(pg, logger)
            pg.click("_pg_qr_button")
    
        elif pm_data["type"] == PaymentMode.WALLET:
            pg.select_mode("_pg_wallet_list", WalletMode.AMAZON_PAY.value)
            bill_amount, conv_charges, total_amount = self._get_amounts(pg, logger)
            pg.click("_procced_button_submit")
    
        elif pm_data["type"] == PaymentMode.INTENT:
            pg.click("_pg_intent_app")
            bill_amount, conv_charges, total_amount = self._get_amounts(pg, logger)
            pg.click("_procced_button_submit")
    
        if pm_data["type"] == PaymentMode.CASH_OTHER:
    
            logger.info(f"Handling CASH_OTHER mode with env_prefix: {pm_data['env_prefix']}")
    
            pg.select_mode("_pg_cash_list", pm_data["env_prefix"])
    
    
    
            pg.click("_pg_cash_dropdown")
    
    
    
            if pm_data["env_prefix"] == CashMode.CASH.value:
    
                pg.select_mode("_pg_cash_bank", CashBank.INDIAN_BANK.value)
    
            elif pm_data["env_prefix"] == CashMode.NEFT.value:
    
                pg.click("_pg_neft_bank")
    
            elif pm_data["env_prefix"] == CashMode.RTGS.value:
    
                pg.click("_pg_rtgs_bank")
    
            else:
    
                logger.error(f"Unknown cash mode env_prefix: {pm_data['env_prefix']}")
    
>               raise ValueError(f"Unknown Cash Mode: {pm_data['env_prefix']}")
E               ValueError: Unknown Cash Mode: E-RTGS
